snippet: For certain executives, agents and producers, landing in the right spot on The Hollywood Reporter’s annual ranking of the 100 most powerful women in entertainment has become a blood sport.
abstract: One of most fearsome competitions in show business involves landing right spot on The Hollywood Reporter's annual ranking of 100 most powerful women in entertainment, with executives, agents and producers vying for top spots; nature of competition speaks to lingering insecurities in field where few women hold leadership positions.
lead_paragraph: For certain executives, agents and producers, landing in the right spot on The Hollywood Reporter’s annual ranking of the 100 most powerful women in entertainment has become a blood sport.

headline.seo: Battling for The Hollywood Reporter’s Top 100 Women List
headline.main: What Powerful Hollywood Women Really Want (Besides an Oscar)
headline.print_headline: What Powerful Hollywood Women Really Want (Besides an Oscar)
